snippet: Tunisia’s ruling coalition said early Sunday that it had agreed to hold presidential and parliamentary elections on June 23, with the president being elected directly by voters.
lead_paragraph: Tunisia’s ruling coalition said early Sunday that it had agreed to hold presidential and parliamentary elections on June 23, with the president being elected directly by voters.

headline.seo: Tunisia Sets June Date for Presidential Elections
headline.main: Tunisia Sets June Date for Presidential Elections
headline.print_headline: Tunisia Sets June Date for Presidential Elections
